a Colin Powell return to government- POLITICO Live: Don't look for a Colin Powell return to government Former Secretary of State Colin Powell said Sunday he's not interested and hasn't discussed returning to government. and will assume the position of executive chief. On the official Google blog Eric Schmidt wrote that he, Page and co-founder Sergey Brin had decided it was time to make some structural changes to the company. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, wrote Eric Schmidt . He further discussed their roles, saying that Page would lead product development and technology strategy along with becoming the company's CEO. Sergey Brin will retain his title of co-founder and he will

to lift her legs on command. With her closest friends from Congress holding her hand on Thursday, Gabrielle Giffords opened her left eye and tried to focus on loved ones for the first time. It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving, said Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand of New York.`` She wanted us to know that she was with us 100 per cent and understood everything we were saying.'' take notice-- there's a reason why the Nexus S smartphone has NFC capability. Remember, first the Nexus One and now its S successor is reference design for Google developers and OEMs. Phones, as we know, are used as banks in many poorer parts of the world-- and modern technology means that their use as financial tools can go much further than that, Eric Schmidt writes. Google's third priority relates to the second, by way of empowerment. Already, some handset manufacturers are putting Android on feature phones, not just costlier smartphones. been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star.`` Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up,'' Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
